mapper.select: SELECT *, p.user_id AS post_user_id FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, user_id AS is_liked FROM liked_post WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AS lp ON p.post_id = lp.post_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, user_id AS is_scraped FROM scrap WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AS s ON p.post_id = s.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}

SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.is_anonymous, p.create_date, p.likes, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS comment_count, is_liked FROM post p LEFT JOIN comment c ON p.post_id = c.post_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, user_id AS is_liked FROM liked_post WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AS lp ON p.post_id = lp.post_id GROUP BY p.post_id, is_liked ORDER BY p.create_date DESC
